name: Disinformation Overload
description:
Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jame #3 (Less is More) which was my first Game Jam!

Complete your probation week at Disreguard, a company tasked with keeping disinformation off the internet. Can you complete the week and get the job, or will you be overwhelmed by disinformation?

This game is a parody of current events, and is not intended to make any political statement.
